feature.name: isEmpty
feature.description: Checks if a CharSequence is empty or null.

feature.name: isAnyEmpty
feature.description: Checks if any one of the CharSequences are empty or null.

feature.name: stripToNull
feature.description: Strips whitespace from the start and end of a String returning null if the String is empty after the strip.

feature.name: strip
feature.description: Strips any of a set of characters from the start and end of a String. This is similar to String.trim() but allows the characters to be stripped to be controlled.

feature.name: stripStart
feature.description: Strips any of a set of characters from the beginning of a String.

feature.name: stripEnd
feature.description: Strips any of a set of characters from the end of a String.

feature.name: indexOf
feature.description: Finds the first index within a CharSequence, handling null. This method uses String.indexOf(String, int) if possible.

feature.name: ordinalIndexOf
feature.description: Finds the n-th index within a String, handling null. This method uses String.indexOf(String) if possible.

feature.name: indexOfIgnoreCase
feature.description: Case in-sensitive find of the first index within a CharSequence.

feature.name: indexOfAny
feature.description: Search a CharSequence to find the first index of any character in the given set of characters.

feature.name: left
feature.description: Returns given number of characters from the end of a String.

feature.name: right
feature.description: Returns given number of characters from the beginning of a String.

feature.name: mid
feature.description: Returns given number of characters from the middle of a String.

feature.name: substringBefore
feature.description: Gets the substring before the first occurrence of a separator. The separator is not returned.

feature.name: substringAfter
feature.description: Gets the substring after the first occurrence of a separator. The separator is not returned.

feature.name: isArrayEmpty
feature.description: Checks if an array of Objects is empty or null.

feature.name: addAll
feature.description: Adds all the elements of the given arrays into a new array.

feature.name: regionMatches
feature.description: Tests if two CharSequence regions are equal.

feature.name: lastIndexOf
feature.description: Finds the last index in the CharSequence that matches the specified character.

feature.name: toCharArray
feature.description: Returns an array of chars representing this CharSequence.
